page.title: 09WHITEMOOR VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: Whitemoor C P School serves the village and the surrounding area. It is a small school with 45 on roll, divided between 2 classes, Infant and Junior. There are 2 full-time teachers and 1 part-time teacher,1 care-taker, 1 supervisory lunchtime assistant, part-time secretary and 1 servery assistant.Meals are cooked at St.Austell.On average over half the pupils stay for school lunch, and about 10 have a packed lunch, the remainder live only a short distance from the school and go home to lunch. Whitemoor School has good liason with Nanpean and Trethosa C P Schools and on one afternoon each week the Junior pupils meet for a Games Session.The 4th year peer groups travel to the Secondary School at St.Stephen-in- Brannel for Science lessons fortnightly.
